newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Yeltsin to announce cabinet changes end week - PM.
newsitem.headline: Yeltsin to announce cabinet changes end week - PM.

text.p: President Boris Yeltsin is likely to announce personnel changes in the Russian government at the end of this week, Prime Minister Viktor Chernomyrdin told Itar-Tass news agency on Tuesday.

Earlier on Tuesday Yeltsin ordered a reorganisation of the government, effectively telling Chernomyrdin and his first deputy Anatoly Chubais to form a new cabinet. He gave Chernomyrdin one week to come up with a new cabinet line-up.
